abstracts.cdata!:
The credit provides support for
            Benin's program of economic and financial recovery. The
            program aims at a reorientation of Benin's development
            strategy from over-emphasis on State intervention to greater
            reliance on private initiative and market forces.
            Specifically, the program aims at: (i) reducing the role of
            the public sector in the economy in order to focus it on a
            core set of services; (ii) reinforce public sector resource
            management; (iii) restructuring of the banking system; and
            (iv) reorganizing incentive policies to promote private
            sector activities. The proceeds of the credit will be used
            to finance merchandise imports and part of the external
            capital requirement.
